duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Project Manager in coordinating and overseeing construction projects, with a focus on pool construction.
Collaborate with the project team and provide support as needed to ensure project timelines and quality standards are met.
Learn and develop skills required to eventually take on the role of a 2nd Project Manager for pool construction projects.
Assist the crew with various tasks as necessary to ensure smooth project progress.
Contribute to the overall success of the business by being a dedicated and long-term team member.
